title: Refresh Your Relationship
itunes:title: Refresh Your Relationship
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought about Nicole Ari Parker recent comments about wanting newness in her marriage. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Nascar driver Kyle Larson for saying the N word and then apologizing for it. Also we had Senator Marco Rubio and Tim Scott call in where they spoke about helping small businesses during these times and more

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought about Nicole Ari Parker recent comments about wanting newness in her marriage. Also we had Senator Marco Rubio and Tim Scott call in where they spoke about helping small businesses during these times and more
